User: Yes, I need a laptop that can handle heavy graphics work. Can you tell me more about its specifications?

Salesman: Absolutely. This laptop comes with a 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 1TB SSD. It's perfect for graphic design and video editing.
User: That sounds great. How about the battery life?

Salesman: The battery can last up to 12 hours on a single charge, so you can work all day without needing to recharge. It also supports fast charging.
